overview: In order to rekindling the flame, some lovers are ready for the most perverted games, if it means to find a new sexual harmony with their loved ones. A very secret company offers to couples that kind of services. Each lover must imagine the sexual fantasy they dream of for their partner without any limit. Being kidnapped and sexually assaulted by a gang of violent abductors, winning at casino and banging the croupier, embodying a slutty lawyer behind bars Nothing his too hard or taboo for the love or their life.
title: Captive
